name: Divine Oracle
text: You become the voice of your god, full of prophecy and omens. When you use your oracular powers, your eyes glow with the silvery depths of the Astral Sea.

features.foresight(11thLevel): You and each ally within 5 squares of you cannot be surprised
features.propheticAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also gain an extra move action that you can use on a different turn of yours during this encounter
features.terrifyingInsight(16thLevel): When you make an attack roll against Will, you can roll twice and use the higher result
